```{r, messages = FALSE, warnings = FALSE, echo = FALSE, error = FALSE, eval = TRUE}
library(swnsmodelr)
library(ggplot2)
par(mfrow = c(3,2))
df <- swns_stations_df %>% add_date_columns()
df$year <- df$year %>%  as.factor()
for(station_now in df$stationid %>% unique()){
print(suppressWarnings(ggplot(data = df %>% filter(stationid == station_now), aes(x = yday, y = temp_mean)) +
        geom_smooth(aes(colour = year), se = FALSE) +
        labs(title = paste0('Station: ', station_now),
             x = 'Day of the Year',
             y = 'Temperature') +
  scale_color_manual(values = c('2012' = 'salmon',
                                '2013'='gold3',
                                "2014"='seagreen3',
                                '2015'='cyan3',
                                '2016'='cornflowerblue',
                                '2017'='maroon2'))+
    theme(legend.position="none") +
    coord_cartesian(ylim = c(-25, 30),xlim = c(0, 365)) 
   
      )
  )

}
```
